subject: Re: Box Sale !!!!
author: ejspinn
full_text:
i can't find anything on how to hack the 12-587 on you tube?  Care to explain?  

I hacked the 12-469 but the clicking is driving me crazy... the only good thing is i can count how many channels the answers came across and explain to my teammates that 7 (example) channels were changed while that answer came through.

I seen the video on YouTube from Urkel showing 12-587 scanning..looks like it would work good.
